name: Illusion
legendaryAbilityText: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place up to 2 fighters from your reinforcements in any system that contains 1 or more of your ships
legendaryAbilityFlavourText: *Unsurprisingly, the triple-ace instructors emphasize strike-and-fade tactics and misdirection.*
flavourText: *Exists on no known charts and appears deserted to those who stumble across it. However, secretive locals live in cloaked cities heavily defended by swarms of starfighters.*
